europeana:record.dc:title: New observations on scleractinian corals from Indonesia: 3. Species belonging to the Merulinidae with new records of Merulina and Boninastrea
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Borel - Best M.
Suharsono
europeana:record.dc:subject: Porifera, Coelenterata, Echinodermata, Brachyopoda
reef corals; Merulinidae; new records; taxonomical changes; Buginesia Programme; Snellius-II expedition; Merulina; Boninastrea
europeana:record.dc:description: Nine coral species belonging to four genera (one new for Indonesia) and their adaptation to different environmental conditions are discussed. The rare species Merulina triangularis (Veron & Pichon, 1979) and Boninastrea boninensis Yabe & Sugiyama, 1935 are recorded for the first time from Indonesia.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: New observations on scleractinian corals from Indonesia: 3. Species belonging to the Merulinidae with new records of Merulina and Boninastrea (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 65) (Issue 26)
